meanings.definition: Grandioseness: the quality or state of being grandiose
meanings.sent1: The grandioseness of the castle left visitors in awe.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was filled with grandioseness, making it hard to believe.
meanings.sent3: The grandioseness of his plan to build a chocolate fountain in the backyard was met with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The grandioseness of the mountain peak against the sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The grandioseness of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: Grandioseness: an instance of being grandiose
meanings.sent1: The grandioseness of his extravagant outfit turned heads at the party.
meanings.sent2: The grandioseness of her entrance stole the show.
meanings.sent3: The grandioseness of the cake tower made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The grandioseness of the parade float was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The grandioseness of the award ceremony made it a night to remember.
